Name: application_key
Definition: Application ID (primary key)

Name: mvar1
Definition: Credit worthiness score calculated on the basis of borrower's credit history

Name: mvar2
Definition: A score calculated based on the number and riskiness of credit enquiries made to any lender by a borrower

Name: mvar3
Definition: Severity of default by the borrower on any loan(s). Severity is a function of amount, time since default and number of defaults

Name: mvar4
Definition: Severity of default by the borrower on auto loan(s). Severity is a function of amount, time since default and number of defaults

Name: mvar5
Definition: Severity of default by the borrower on education loan(s). Severity is a function of amount, time since default and number of defaults

Name: mvar6
Definition: Minimum of credit available on all revolving credit cards (in $)

Name: mvar7
Definition: Maximum of credit available on all active credit lines (in $)

Name: mvar8
Definition: Maximum of credit available on all active revolving credit cards (in $)

Name: mvar9
Definition: Sum of available credit on credit cards that the borrower has missed 1 payment (in $)

Name: mvar10
Definition: Total amount of credit available on accepted credit lines (in $)

Name: mvar11
Definition: Amount of dues collected post default where due amount was more than 500 (in $)

Name: mvar12
Definition: Sum of amount due on active credit cards (in $)

Name: mvar13
Definition: Annual amount paid towards all credit cards during the previous year (in $)

Name: mvar14
Definition: Annual income (in $)

Name: mvar15
Definition: Estimated market value of a properety owned/used by the borrower (in $)

Name: mvar16
Definition: Number of active revolving credit cards on which full credit limit is utilized by the borrower

Name: mvar17
Definition: Number of active credit cards on which full credit limit is utilized by the borrower

Name: mvar18
Definition: Number of active credit lines on which full credit limit is utilized by the borrower

Name: mvar19
Definition: Number of active credit cards on which atleast 75% credit limit is utilized by the borrower

Name: mvar20
Definition: Number of active credit lines on which atleast 75% credit limit is utilized by the borrower

Name: mvar21
Definition: Average utilization of active revolving credit card loans (%)

Name: mvar22
Definition: Average utilization of line on all active credit lines activated in last 2 years (%)

Name: mvar23
Definition: Average utilization of line on all active credit cards activated in last 1 year (%)

Name: mvar24
Definition: Average utilization of line on credit cards on which the borrower has missed 1 payment during last 6 months (%)

Name: mvar25
Definition: Average tenure of active revolving credit cards (in days)

Name: mvar26
Definition: Tenure of oldest credit card among all active credit cards (in days)

Name: mvar27
Definition: Tenure of oldest revolving credit card among all active revolving credit cards (in days)

Name: mvar28
Definition: Number of days since last missed payment on any credit line

Name: mvar29
Definition: Tenure of oldest credit line (in days)

Name: mvar30
Definition: Maximum tenure on all auto loans (in days)

Name: mvar31
Definition: Maximum tenure on all education loans (in days)

Name: mvar32
Definition: Sum of tenures (in months) of active credit cards

Name: mvar33
Definition: Duration of stay at the current residential address (in years)

Name: mvar34
Definition: Number of active credit lines over the last 6 months on which the borrower has missed 1 payment

Name: mvar35
Definition: Number of revolving credit cards over the last 2 years on which the borrower has missed 1 payment

Name: mvar36
Definition: Number of active credit lines

Name: mvar37
Definition: Number of credit cards with an active tenure of at least 2 years

Name: mvar38
Definition: Number of credit lines activated in last 2 years

Name: mvar39
Definition: Number of credit lines on which the borrower has current delinquency

Name: mvar40
Definition: Utilization of line on active education loans (%)

Name: mvar41
Definition: Utilization of line on active auto loans (%)

Name: mvar42
Definition: Financial stress index of the borrower. This index is a function of collection trades, bankruptcies files, tax liens invoked, etc.

Name: mvar43
Definition: Number of credit lines on which the borrower has never missed a payment in last 2 yrs, yet considered as high risk loans based on market prediction of economic scenario

Name: mvar44
Definition: Ratio of maximum amount due on all active credit lines and sum of amounts due on all active credit lines

Name: mvar45
Definition: Number of mortgage loans on which the borrower has missed 2 payments

Name: mvar46
Definition: Number of auto loans on which the borrower has missed 2 payments

Name: mvar47
Definition: Type of product that the applicant applied for. (C = Charge; L = Lending)

Name: default_ind
Definition: Indicator for default
